verses.verse: Now Korah, <S%H7141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar, <S%H3324><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab, <S%H446><s%> and On, <S%H203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Peleth, <S%H6431><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> men:

And they rose up <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> with certain <S%H376><s%> of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> of the assembly, <S%H5712><s%> famous <S%H7148><s%> in the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of renown: <S%H8034><s%>

And they gathered themselves together <S%H6950><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Ye take too much <S%H7227><s%> upon you, seeing <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> are holy, <S%H6918><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> of them, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> them: wherefore <S%H4069><s%> then lift ye up yourselves <S%H5375><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the LORD? <S%H3068><s%>
And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, he fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his face: <S%H6440><s%>

And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Korah <S%H7141><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his company, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Even tomorrow <S%H1242><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will show <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are his, and who is holy; <S%H6918><s%> and will cause him to come near <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him: even him whom <S%H834><s%> he hath chosen <S%H977><s%> will he cause to come near <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him.
This <S%H2063><s%> do; <S%H6213><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> you censers, <S%H4289><s%> Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his company; <S%H5712><s%>

And put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> therein, and put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> tomorrow: <S%H4279><s%> and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> that the man <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> doth choose, <S%H977><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall be holy: <S%H6918><s%> ye take too much <S%H7227><s%> upon you, ye sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi. <S%H3878><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Hear, <S%H8085><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> ye sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%>

Seemeth it but a small thing <S%H4592><s%> unto <S%H4480><s%> you, that <S%H3588><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath separated <S%H914><s%> you from the congregation <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to bring you near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H413><s%> himself to do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> unto them?

And he hath brought thee near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> to him, and all <S%H3605><s%> thy brethren <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee: and seek <S%H1245><s%> ye the priesthood <S%H3550><s%> also? <S%H1571><s%>

For which cause <S%H3651><s%> both thou <S%H859><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thy company <S%H5712><s%> are gathered together <S%H3259><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> is Aaron, <S%H175><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye murmur <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab: <S%H446><s%> which said, <S%H559><s%> We will not <S%H3808><s%> come up: <S%H5927><s%>

Is it a small thing <S%H4592><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou hast brought us up <S%H5927><s%> out of a land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> us in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> except <S%H3588><s%> thou make thyself altogether a prince <S%H8323><s%> <S%H8323><s%> <S%H1571><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us?

Moreover <S%H637><s%> thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> us into <S%H413><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> or given <S%H5414><s%> us inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of fields <S%H7704><s%> and vineyards: <S%H3754><s%> wilt thou put out <S%H5365><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of these <S%H1992><s%> men? <S%H376><s%> we will not <S%H3808><s%> come up. <S%H5927><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very wroth, <S%H2734><s%> <S%H3966><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Respect <S%H6437><s%> <S%H413><s%> not <S%H408><s%> thou their offering: <S%H4503><s%> I have not <S%H3808><s%> taken <S%H5375><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ass <S%H2543><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> them, neither <S%H3808><s%> have I hurt <S%H7489><s%> <S%H853><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Be <S%H1961><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thy company <S%H5712><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and they, <S%H1992><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> tomorrow: <S%H4279><s%>

And take <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer, <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> them, and bring <S%H7126><s%> ye before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer, <S%H4289><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> censers; <S%H4289><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> also, and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> each <S%H376><s%> of you his censer. <S%H4289><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer, <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in <S%H413><s%> them, and laid <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon, <S%H413><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

And Korah <S%H7141><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them unto <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Separate yourselves <S%H914><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them in a moment. <S%H7281><s%>

And they fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> their faces, <S%H6440><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O God, <S%H410><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> shall one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> sin, <S%H2398><s%> and wilt thou be wroth <S%H7107><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation? <S%H5712><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Get you up <S%H5927><s%> from about <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Dathan, <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram. <S%H48><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram; <S%H48><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Depart, <S%H5493><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the tents <S%H168><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> wicked <S%H7563><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and touch <S%H5060><s%> nothing <S%H408><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of theirs, lest <S%H6435><s%> ye be consumed <S%H5595><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> their sins. <S%H2403><s%>

So they got up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Dathan, <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> on every side: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%> came out, <S%H3318><s%> and stood <S%H5324><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of their tents, <S%H168><s%> and their wives, <S%H802><s%> and their sons, <S%H1121><s%> and their little children. <S%H2945><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Hereby <S%H2063><s%> ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> works; <S%H4639><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have not <S%H3808><s%> done them of mine own mind. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3820><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> these <S%H428><s%> men die <S%H4191><s%> the common death <S%H4194><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> men, <S%H120><s%> or if they be visited <S%H6485><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> the visitation <S%H6486><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> men; <S%H120><s%> then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me.

But if <S%H518><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H1254><s%> a new thing, <S%H1278><s%> and the earth <S%H127><s%> open <S%H6475><s%> <S%H853><s%> her mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and swallow them up, <S%H1104><s%> <S%H853><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> appertain unto them, and they go down <S%H3381><s%> quick <S%H2416><s%> into the pit; <S%H7585><s%> then ye shall understand <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> have provoked <S%H5006><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> that the ground <S%H127><s%> cleaved asunder <S%H1234><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was under <S%H8478><s%> them:

And the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> her mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and swallowed them up, <S%H1104><s%> <S%H853><s%> and their houses, <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H120><s%> that <S%H834><s%> appertained unto Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their goods. <S%H7399><s%>

They, <S%H1992><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> appertained to them, went down <S%H3381><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%> into the pit, <S%H7585><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> closed <S%H3680><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them: and they perished <S%H6><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the congregation. <S%H6951><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were round about <S%H5439><s%> them fled <S%H5127><s%> at the cry <S%H6963><s%> of them: for <S%H3588><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> Lest <S%H6435><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> swallow us up <S%H1104><s%> also.

And there came out <S%H3318><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> the <S%H853><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that offered <S%H7126><s%> incense. <S%H7004><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> that he take up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H853><s%> the censers <S%H4289><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H996><s%> the burning, <S%H8316><s%> and scatter <S%H2219><s%> thou the fire <S%H784><s%> yonder; <S%H1973><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they are hallowed. <S%H6942><s%>

<S%H853><s%> The censers <S%H4289><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%> against their own souls, <S%H5315><s%> let them make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> them broad <S%H7555><s%> plates <S%H6341><s%> for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they offered <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> therefore they are hallowed: <S%H6942><s%> and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> a sign <S%H226><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the brazen <S%H5178><s%> censers, <S%H4289><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> they that were burnt <S%H8313><s%> had offered; <S%H7126><s%> and they were made broad <S%H7554><s%> plates for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

To be a memorial <S%H2146><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> <S%H834><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> stranger, <S%H376><s%> <S%H2114><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> of the seed <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2233><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> come near <S%H7126><s%> to offer <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> that he be <S%H1961><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> as Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and as his company: <S%H5712><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to him by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

But on the morrow <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4283><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Ye <S%H859><s%> have killed <S%H4191><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the congregation <S%H5712><s%> was gathered <S%H6950><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> that they looked <S%H6437><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> it, and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared. <S%H7200><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came <S%H935><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
